events.name: lithium-ion recycling
events.wd_description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.
events.description: Methods for recycling lithium-ion batteries including pyrometallurgical, hydrometallurgical, bioleaching, and direct recycling.

events.name: pyrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.
events.description: Employs extreme heat to transform metal oxides into cobalt, copper, iron, and nickel alloys.

events.name: hydrometallurgical
events.wd_description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.
events.description: Uses aqueous solutions to leach targeted metals out from the cathode substance.

events.name: bioleaching
events.wd_description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.
events.description: Uses bacteria to retrieve precious metals.

events.name: New cathode materials
events.wd_description: New cathode materials, such as LG's NMC 811 and Ultium Cells' cathodes, aim to reduce the reliance on cobalt and other critical minerals in lithium-ion batteries.
events.description: New cathode materials, such as LG's NMC 811 and Ultium Cells' cathodes, aim to reduce the reliance on cobalt and other critical minerals in lithium-ion batteries.

events.name: NMC 811
events.wd_description: LG's NMC 811 cathode material contains eight parts nickel and one part each of cobalt and magnesium, reducing the reliance on cobalt.
events.description: LG's NMC 811 cathode material contains eight parts nickel and one part each of cobalt and magnesium, reducing the reliance on cobalt.

events.name: Ultium Cells
events.wd_description: Ultium Cells' cathodes, used in GM's EVs, further reduce the need for cobalt and magnesium with a composition of seventeen parts nickel to one part each of cobalt, magnesium, and aluminum.
events.description: Ultium Cells' cathodes, used in GM's EVs, further reduce the need for cobalt and magnesium with a composition of seventeen parts nickel to one part each of cobalt, magnesium, and aluminum.

events.name: Cobalt-free batteries
events.wd_description: Cobalt-free batteries, such as LFP (lithium-iron-phosphate) batteries, offer a less mineral-intensive alternative, though with reduced energy density.
events.description: Cobalt-free batteries, such as LFP (lithium-iron-phosphate) batteries, offer a less mineral-intensive alternative, though with reduced energy density.

events.name: Development of new cathode materials
events.description: New cathode materials, such as NMC 811 and Ultium Cells, reduce the need for cobalt and magnesium. Cobalt-free batteries like LFP offer less mineral-intensive alternatives.
